programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: Cross-cultural musical drama starring Julia Stiles. Forced to live with her estranged father in a tough Chicago suburb following the death of her mother, aspiring ballerina Sara Johnson finds her life further complicated when she embarks on a relationship with a boy from the other side of the racial divide Thomas Carter - Director Julia Stiles - Sara Johnson Sean Patrick Thomas - Derek Kerry Washington - Chenille Fredro Starr - Malakai Terry Kinney - Roy Bianca Lawson - Nikki Vince Green - Snookie Garland Whitt - Kenny Julia Stiles - Sara Johnson Sean Patrick Thomas - Derek Kerry Washington - Chenille Fredro Starr - Malakai Terry Kinney - Roy Bianca Lawson - Nikki Vince Green - Snookie Garland Whitt - Kenny.

programme.title: The Legend of Zorro
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Romance, Thriller, Western ║ 2005 ║ PG
programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure, a sequel to The Mask of Zorro, starring Antonio Banderas and Catherine Zeta-Jones. America, 1850: as the territory of California seeks to become part of the Union, plans are undermined by a nefarious plot initiated by a mysterious organisation. programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Jungle adventure starring Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney and Ernie Hudson. Primatologist Peter Elliot has trained Amy, a gorilla, to communicate through sign language and has arranged an expedition to return her to the wild. Karen Ross, searching for her former fiancé who disappeared while looking for rare diamonds, also joins the group. programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Drama starring Tom Hanks, Denzel Washington and Jason Robards. Andrew Beckett's career at a prestigious law firm appears to be taking off. But Beckett hasn't revealed to his employers that he is gay or that he is HIV positive. programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr and Renée Zellweger. As a top agent at Sports Management International, Jerry Maguire knows his way around and is his own man... until one day he gets an attack of decency and finds himself out of a job. Now he must start from scratch. His only allies are a single mother, her cheeky young son and a second-rate player for the Arizona Cardinals Cameron Crowe - Director Tom Cruise - Jerry Maguire Cuba Gooding Jr - Rod Tidwell Renée Zellweger - Dorothy Boyd Kelly Preston - Avery Bishop Jerry O'Connell - Frank Cushman Jay Mohr - Bob Sugar Bonnie Hunt - Laurel Boyd Regina King - Marcee Tidwell Jonathan Lipnicki - Ray Boyd Todd Louiso - Chad the nanny Eric Stoltz - Ethan Valhere Tom Cruise - Jerry Maguire Cuba Gooding Jr - Rod Tidwell Renée Zellweger - Dorothy Boyd Kelly Preston - Avery Bishop Jerry O'Connell - Frank Cushman Jay Mohr - Bob Sugar Bonnie Hunt - Laurel Boyd Regina King - Marcee Tidwell Jonathan Lipnicki - Ray Boyd Todd Louiso - Chad the nanny Eric Stoltz - Ethan Valhere.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her

programme.desc: Black comedy starring Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis and Goldie Hawn. In the 14 years since actress Madeline Ashton stole writer Helen Sharp's fiancé, time has not been kind. programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel, starring Emily Blunt and Rebecca Ferguson. Divorce is made all the more painful for Rachel Watson because her morning commute takes her past the home where her ex-husband lives with his new wife. Rachel becomes curious about an attractive couple living close by, and her interest develops into an obsession when the woman is declared missing. Although convinced she may know something about the disappearance, Rachel's strained emotional state and a history of alcohol abuse make her story hard to believe Tate Taylor - Director Emily Blunt - Rachel Watson Rebecca Ferguson - Anna Watson Haley Bennett - Megan Hipwell Justin Theroux - Tom Watson Luke Evans - Scott Hipwell Allison Janney - Detective Riley Edgar Ramirez - Dr Kamal Abdic Lisa Kudrow - Martha Laura Prepon - Cathy Emily Blunt - Rachel Watson Rebecca Ferguson - Anna Watson Haley Bennett - Megan Hipwell Justin Theroux - Tom Watson Luke Evans - Scott Hipwell Allison Janney - Detective Riley Edgar Ramirez - Dr Kamal Abdic Lisa Kudrow - Martha Laura Prepon - Cathy.

programme.title: The Boat That Rocked
programme.desc: Period comedy written and directed by Richard Curtis, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bill Nighy and Rhys Ifans. At the height of the Swinging Sixties, the pirate DJs of Radio Rock take to the high seas to play rock and pop music in defiance of the British government. programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy drama starring Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins. Media tycoon William Parrish has lived a rich life in every sense, but fears that his days are numbered. programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel, starring Emily Blunt and Rebecca Ferguson. Divorce is made all the more painful for Rachel Watson because her morning commute takes her past the home where her ex-husband lives with his new wife. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Stranded by a snowstorm, which he failed to predict, Phil wakes up the following morning to discover that it's still the day before, and it slowly dawns on the world-weary forecaster that he'll never have to worry about tomorrow Harold Ramis - Director Bill Murray - Phil Connors Andie MacDowell - Rita Hanson Chris Elliott - Larry Stephen Tobolowsky - Ned Brian Doyle-Murray - Buster Marita Geraghty - Nancy Angela Paton - Mrs Lancaster Rick Ducommun - Gus Rick Overton - Ralph Robin Duke - Doris the waitress Carol Bivins - Anchorwoman Michael Shannon - Fred Bill Murray - Phil Connors Andie MacDowell - Rita Hanson Chris Elliott - Larry Stephen Tobolowsky - Ned Brian Doyle-Murray - Buster Marita Geraghty - Nancy Angela Paton - Mrs Lancaster Rick Ducommun - Gus Rick Overton - Ralph Robin Duke - Doris the waitress Carol Bivins - Anchorwoman Michael Shannon - Fred.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. The pair pretend to be deliriously in love during the once-in-a-lifetime trip and keep up appearances in front of other guests. programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: New girl Sandy causes a ruckus at Rydell High when stud Danny falls for her. Classic musical with John Travolta and the late Olivia Newton-John. (1978)(106 mins).

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Julia Roberts plays the gutsy mum who takes on a corporation polluting local water. Oscar winner from Steven Soderbergh, with the late Albert Finney. Strong language. (2000)(125 mins).

programme.title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
programme.desc: Govinda won the 'Best Comic Actor' at the Filmfare Awards 2000 and Zee Cine Awards 2000. Anupam Kher won the 'Best Comic Actor' at the Screen Awards, in 2000.

programme.title: Yamla Pagla Deewana
programme.desc: A married Canadian travels to India to re-unite with his estranged father and brother but faces obstacles and challenges.

programme.title: One Two Three
programme.desc: (2008) Three men (Tusshar Kapoor, Sunil Shetty and Paresh Rawal) with the same name, Laxmi Narayan, get into trouble with the don Papa (Mukesh Tiwari). A film of comedy and chaos!

programme.title: Sanam
programme.desc: (1997) Gaurav is deprived of love from his family. After his elder brother Narendra dies in an accident, Gaurav attempts to fill-in for him and joins the army to make his father proud.

programme.title: Qarib Qarib Singlle
programme.desc: A widowed Jaya and Yogi meet through a dating app and embark on a trip together. Will love bloom between two people as different as chalk and cheese? (2017).

programme.title: Ram Lakhan
programme.desc: (Movie@6) Rakhee Gulzar won 'Best Supporting Actress' award, Anupam Kher and Sathish Kaushik won 'Best Comic Actor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1990.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Sridevi won the 'Best Actress' award, A. R. Rahman won the 'Best Music & Background Score at the National Film Awards, India 2018.

programme.title: Jazbaa
programme.desc: (2015) Anuradha, an honest lawyer & single mother, finds herself in a do-or-die situation when her daughter Sanaya is kidnapped. Aishwarya Rai got an award for 'Power-Packed Performance'.

programme.title: Jazbaa
programme.desc: (2015) Anuradha, an honest lawyer & single mother, finds herself in a do-or-die situation when her daughter Sanaya is kidnapped. Aishwarya Rai got an award for 'Power-Packed Performance of the Year'.

programme.title: Sirf Tum
programme.desc: A 1999 love story about Deepak (Sanjay Kapoor) and Aarti (Priya Gill) who fall in love without seeing each other. Neha (Sushmita Sen) who also loves Deepak provides the third angle.

programme.title: Nil Battey Sannata
programme.desc: Swara Bhaskar won the 'Best Actress' award and Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari won the 'Best Debut Director' award at various award functions.

programme.title: Aakhri Raasta
programme.desc: (1986) A conflict comes between a father and his son (both played by Amitabh Bachchan) when the father seeks revenge for the rape and murder of his wife, only to be stopped by his son.

programme.title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
programme.desc: A 2002 comedy about Raja (Anil Kapoor) who enters the lives of friends-turned-foes, the Chaddas and the D'souzas, claiming to be their grandson but what's Raja's ulterior motive?

programme.title: Singhasan
programme.desc: The kingdoms of Avanti and Gandharva are plagued by enemies with vested interests. But chief commander of Gandharva, Vikram Singh, is a brave warrior who aims to outsmart one and all.

programme.title: Kurukshetra
programme.desc: (Movie @6) ACP Prithviraj, an honest man, arrests Chief Minister Baburao's son for raping a woman. Consequently, Baburao leaves no stone unturned to get revenge against Prithviraj.

programme.title: Saand Ki Aankh
programme.desc: Bhumi Pednekar and Taapsee Pannu won 'Critics Award for Best Actress' at the Screen Awards, in 2020 and Filmfare Awards 2020.

programme.title: Thappad
programme.desc: This Movie claimed best film in Asian Films Awards, Awards of the International Indian Film Academy Best Dialogue, Gender Sensitivity Award, Tapsee Pannu got Best Actress award for this movie.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A 1981 release film is a saga of Rocky's revenge for his father's death. Starring Sanjay Dutt, Tina Munim. Directed by Sunil Dutt. Music by R D Burman.

programme.title: Mere Pyaare Prime Minister
programme.desc: This movie won Best International Film award in Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror Films, USA.

programme.title: Dil Hi Dil Mein
programme.desc: Having risen from poverty, Ram helps the needy and deserving whenever he can. One such boy is Raja who also seeks Ram's help with his love. Ram is unaware that the girl is his own daughter, Roja.

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
programme.desc: (2003) A fun filled family film directed by Sooraj Barjatya and starring Hrithik Roshan, Kareena Kapoor and Abhishek Bachchan. Music by Anu Malik.

programme.title: Mausam
programme.sub-title: A war, religious conflicts, and misunderstandings create obstacles for a couple of different faiths. Stars
programme.desc: Shahid Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, Anupam Kher.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Sara Ali Khan won the 'Best Debut Actress' award at the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2019, Filmfare Awards 2019 & Screen Awards in 2020.

programme.title: Manikarnika: The Queen Of Jhansi
programme.desc: (2019) The story of Rani Lakshmibai, one of the leading figures of the Indian rebellion of 1857 and her resistance to the British Rule. Starring Kangana Ranaut.

programme.title: Bharat
programme.desc: Bharat is one of the highest grossing film in 2020 also won many awards for Best actor and Best songs of the year.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Kal Aaj Aur Kal
programme.sub-title: 1971 release film is about the ideological clash between three generations
programme.desc: grandparent, parent and youth. Stars: Prithviraj Kapoor, Raj Kapoor, Randhir Kapoor.

programme.title: Munna Michael
programme.desc: Nidhhi Agerwal won award for the Best Debut Actress. Mahinder, a gangster, hires Munna, a dancer, to train him so that he can impress his lady-love, Dolly. However, Dolly suddenly goes missing..

programme.title: Biwi Ho To Aisi
programme.desc: (1988) Mrs. Bhandari rules over her house with an iron hand. Her son gets married to Shalu (Rekha) and soon her reign of terror is challenged and a no holds barred battle ensues.

programme.title: Super Nani
programme.desc: The movie revolves around how an Indian woman, Bharti, whose family does not value her or her sacrifices. Her grandson, Mann comes to her rescue. Starring Rekha, Sharman Joshi.

programme.title: Khoon Bhari Mang
programme.desc: Rekha won the 'Best Actress' award, Sonu Walia won the 'Best Supporting Actress' award and Sanjay Verma won the 'Best Editor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1989.

programme.title: Judaa Hoke Bhi
programme.desc: (Movie @6) A married couple struggling with an unimaginable loss are further torn apart when they are lured under false pretences to Uttarakhand separately.

programme.title: Kahaani 2: Durga Rani Singh
programme.desc: Vidya Balan praised with the Most Entertaining Actress in a Thriller Role in Big Star Entertainment Awards, India.

programme.title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
programme.desc: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara broke several records at the box office including the highest-grossing Indian film till year 2011. The film was praised globally and won several awards including 'Best Film'.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Khudgarz
programme.desc: Sita raises her son, Bihari, friend Amar as her own and the 2 treat each other like brothers. However, Amar's father is not too fond of Bihari, he tries to create a rift between two.

programme.title: Strangers
programme.desc: (2007) Two strangers meet on a train journey, talk and decide to eliminate each other's spouses to alleviate themselves of the hell they are trapped in.

programme.title: Shahenshah
programme.desc: Amitabh Bachchan as Shahenshah seeks to wipe out evil at night, while he parades as a corrupt cop during the day. Meenakshi Sheshadri plays his lady love.

programme.title: Don
programme.desc: Amitabh Bachchan won the 'Best Actor' award, Kishore Kumar won the 'Best Singer - Male' award and Asha Bhosle won the 'Best Singer - Female' award at the Filmfare Awards 1979.

programme.title: Shamitabh
programme.desc: (2015) An aspiring actor who cannot speak joins forces with a man who has a powerful voice. Together they take the film industry by storm, but will their egos get in the way?

programme.title: Bholaa
programme.desc: (Movie @6) After a decade-long prison sentence, an ex-convict endeavours to meet his daughter. However, he faces numerous obstacles during his journey.

programme.title: Raazi

programme.title: Satyam Shivam Sundaram
programme.desc: Laxmikant, Pyarelal won an award for the 'Best Music Direction' and Radhu Karmakar won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Filmfare Awards 1979.

programme.title: Shiv Bhakt Katha
programme.desc: A film that illustrates various narratives of devotees' unwavering faith. Directed by renowned filmmaker Dheeraj Kumar.

programme.title: Hariyali Aur Raaste
programme.desc: A man's marriage is fixed in his childhood, but he grows up and falls for another woman. He weds the woman of his elders' choice but is unhappy despite having a son.

programme.title: Chintu Ka Birthday

programme.desc: Web Original Film'.

programme.desc: Raju and Duryodhan are friends, however, a misunderstanding creates differences between them. A determined Raju trains in martial arts to eliminate the power Duryodhan.

programme.title: Mughal-E-Azam
programme.desc: The film was a super hit and became the highest-grossing Indian film. It won the 'Best Film' award at the Filmfare Awards 1961 and National Film Awards, India 1961.

programme.title: Jodi No.1

programme.desc: A film that celebrates the fierce form of the Goddess Kali. Directed by renowned filmmaker Dheeraj Kumar.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn.
